thread.title: Ashok Selvan Avanthika Mishra Nenjamellam Kadhal launched with pooja today - Tamil Movie News
thread.title_full: Ashok Selvan Avanthika Mishra Nenjamellam Kadhal launched with pooja today - Tamil Movie News

title: Ashok Selvan Avanthika Mishra Nenjamellam Kadhal launched with pooja today - Tamil Movie News

persons.name: ashok selvan avanthika mishra nenjamellam kadhal

text: 'Thala 57' Title, 'Thalapathy 61' Cast & Crew and Vikram's Fresh pair Young and promising hero Ashok Selvan is presently busy with multiple projects in Tamil cinema. Today (February 6, 2017) a new film with the 'Thegidi' actor in lead role has been launched with a formal pooja. The film has been titled as 'Nenjamellam Kadhal' and it will have Ashok Selvan and newcomer Avanthika Mishra in lead roles. Debutant writer-director Nirman has penned the story, screenplay and dialogues and he will be wielding the megaphone. 'Nenjamellam Kadhal' boasts off a strong supporting cast that includes Oorvashi, Azhagam Perumal. Badava Gopi, M.S.Bhaskar and Soniya among others. Nivas.K.Prasanna of 'Thegidi' and 'Sethupathi' fame will be providing the music score. Ganesh Chandra will be the cinematographer. Editing will be taken care by I.J.Alen DFT. Jayachandran will look after the Art Direction department. Produced by S.Sudhakaran under Friends Festival Films banner, 'Nenjamellam Kadhal' stars rolling from today. IndiaGlitz wishes All the Best for the team to come up with a great film.
